#### Install and load packages from CRAN ####
myPkgs <- c("tidyverse", 
            "RefManageR", 
            "DiagrammeR", 
            "here")

# Create a function for install and loading packages
ipak <- function(pkg){
    new.pkg <- pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"])]
    if (length(new.pkg)) 
        install.packages(new.pkg, dependencies = TRUE)
    sapply(pkg, library, character.only = TRUE)
}

# Detach all packages just in case...
if(!is.null(sessionInfo()$otherPkgs)) lapply(paste('package:',names(sessionInfo()$otherPkgs),sep=""),detach,character.only=TRUE,unload=TRUE)
# Load and install pkgs using my fun
suppressWarnings(suppressMessages(ipak(myPkgs)))

           hyperlink = FALSE, 
           dashed = FALSE)
bib <- ReadBib("myBib.bib")
